trends: There has been one other sighting in Montrose
There were no other sightings in Montrose on or around August 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching tv. Son came from outside to tell me to come see something weird in sky. Went out to road so there were no obstructions. (We are in the country. Dirt road, expansive dark sky, etc) Stood and watched a bright, fuzzy edged roundish light moving from south to north across the sky. Appeared to be faintly pulsating. Deviated a couple times from straight line flight. Moving to the left and right. Slower moving than planes I've seen. Did not hear any sound. Kept watching until it seemed to pulsate or extinguish into nothing.
Summary: red/orange lightly pulsating bright light s to n flight path with a few l to r deviations. 3 minutes. seemed to vanish or extinguish into nothingness
